name: Fragile Soul
description:
Fragile Soul is a new rogue-like role-playing game in which you play as the soul of a hero that fell in battle a long time ago.

To avoid an eternity of damnation, the soul is forced to traverse dangerous dungeons in order to find the key to his salvation.

Explore the dark corridors and get ready to face fierce monsters that will try to prevent your soul from reaching peace. Cleverly plan each attack as only one hit will rend your attempt void.

Report any bugs, comments, criticisms, and suggestions here!

System Requirements:

--- Minimum

  • Memory: 2GB
  • Disk Space: ~200MB
  • CPU: 1GHz
  • GPU: Radeon X1350 or equivalent
  • Resolution: 1024x720
  • OS: Anything that supports Java7 (Java 1.7)
--- Recommended
  1. Memory: 2GB
  2. Disk Space: ~200MB
  3. CPU: 2GHz
  4. GPU: Radeon 5770 or equivalent
  5. Resolution: 1024x720
  6. OS: Anything that supports Java7 (Java 1.7)
